input: Batch process to update the notes for two prenote entries identified by their UUIDs.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/11111111-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/22222222-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"Note": "Updated Note 1"}

PATCH /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/33333333-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/44444444-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"Note": "Updated Note 2"}

--request-separator--
